amendment.description: To prevent reconciliation legislation from including trillions of dollars in job-killing tax hikes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3652 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 340.

action.text: Amendment SA 3652 proposed by Senator Romney. (consideration: CR S6225-6226; text: CR S6225) To prevent reconciliation legislation from including trillions of dollars in job-killing tax hikes.
